title: [CLIENT] Skin Boost Bug
body:
Hi there,

in my latest ARAM (June 25, 2015 / 21:30) I paid the RP for the "Skin Boost". In the moment I pushed the Button someone wanted to trade with me. After that the "Skin Boost" Button was grey and it read "Processing", but we didn't get the option to choose our skins. In the afterchat was a notice that i paid the RP and get the IP Boost. The RP are now gone, although we couldn't choose our skins. Would be nice if I get the RP back, you can also have your IP back. :) And please fix. Thx. Sry for bad english.

Greetings
Gofodos

replies.body:
Hiya Gofodos! 

Based on what you're describing, the boost did go through. However, if you'd like someone to take a closer look into your account, you're more than welcome to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584). :]
